conbody.p: To view the details of your current license, open Katalon Studio. Go to:

ul.li: macOS: Katalon Studio > About Katalon Studio

conbody.p: In the About Katalon Studio Enterprise dialog, you can view the version, edition and build of Katalon Studio, along with the expiration date of your Katalon license.
To learn more about Katalon licenses, see Types of Licenses.
